job_details.Vacaturetitel: Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time.
   Your role:
     * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.
job_details.full_text:
Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager

You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time.
   Your role:
     * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on designing and developing ML/AI-based algorithms for patient monitoring, emphasizing predictive modeling for risk prediction and vital signs analysis. While generative AI is mentioned, the core seems to be traditional ML for prediction and classification in a medical context, aligning with the ML Engineer profile.

phrases: design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions
vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, development, and adaptation of machine learning and AI models for specific tasks like prediction and analysis.

phrases: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings
develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases imply the need to integrate and deploy AI/ML solutions into functional, reliable systems within specific healthcare environments, requiring software development practices.
These phrases indicate an understanding of the business goals (improving outcomes, reducing costs) and the need to collaborate with business-related teams (clinical, marketing).

phrases: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings
job_tasks.justification: The mention of deployment in specific care settings suggests a need for operational considerations to ensure the models function reliably in production environments.

soft_skills.phrase: design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms
Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation
works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams
Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader
